prime.gui.managers.InvalidationManager

type
class
extends
QueueManager
available in
swf
metadata
:build
'???'
:keep
Manager object which can be called by every IInvalidating object. When an IInvalidating object calls InvalidationManager.invalidate( obj ), the manager will add the object to a queue of objects and starts listening for the next ENTER_FRAME event (flash). When an ENTER_FRAME event comes, the manager will loop through the queue of invalid objects and call their 'validate' method.
